# GET /v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/gameCenterActivities | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/gameCenterActivities ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterDetails-_id_-relationships-gameCenterActivities)

-  GET /v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/gameCenterActivities 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/gameCenterActivities

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterDetails-_id_-relationships-gameCenterActivities#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/gameCenterActivities
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterDetails-_id_-relationships-gameCenterActivities#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterDetails-_id_-relationships-gameCenterActivities#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterDetails-_id_-relationships-gameCenterActivities#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[GameCenterDetailGameCenterActivitiesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterdetailgamecenteractivitieslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterDetails-_id_-relationships-gameCenterActivities#see-also)
